title: 03/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Bears, Seahawks, Watson
itunes:title: 03/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Bears, Seahawks, Watson
description:
Chicago Bears are a victim of having a bad GM

Deshaun Watson has given his list of teams he would play for

More on the rift between Seahawks HC Pete Carroll and QB Russell Wilson


Guest: Nick Wright

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
